DOC.brief_summary: 80 American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) grade I-II patient , 18-60 year old , schedule elective upper limb orthopaedic surgery supraclavicular brachial plexus block , include prospective study . The patient randomly assign group R ( Ropivacaine alone ) group RD ( Ropivacaine dexmedetomidine ) ( 40 patient group ) . Group R receive Ropivacaine 0.50 % ( 30 cc ) + placebo group RD receive Ropivacaine 0.50 % ( 30 cc ) + dexmedetomidine 1 µg/kg .
